reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the T Hotel for 1 night during our 2 week holiday travelling around Sardinia. Hotel is very modern, room was excellent - very spacious with huge bathroom and very clean - we paid slightly extra for a deluxe room, were located on the 13th floor of the tower (would recommend). Breakfast buffet included, good selection although would not recommend the cooked breakfast. Hotel was fine for our 1 night in Cagliari - 25 minute walk to the old town (up hill!) - taxi back from the marina cost 10 EUR. However this is a business hotel and would not recommend for more than a 1 night stay if you are on holiday in Cagliari. Apparently the hotel has a great spa but it's not free for hotel guests and was very expensive. Also had to pay to use wi-fi which i did not expect in a 4* business hotel. Staff were polite & helpful however do not stay here if you want a personable service and Sardinian character.
reviews.title: New modern business hotel, great for 1 night in Cagliari, would not recommend for a longer stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We arrived at 3.00 pm to be told apologetically that our room was not yet ready. 30 minutes and a couple of cocktails ‘on the house’ later, our luggage had been taken to our room and we arrived at our Junior Suite on the 13th floor. The room was sizeable, if not a bit bizarre! The bathroom and toilet must have been around 25sqm. There was space for at least two hand basins, yet only one had been fitted. The shower was in the bath, but no sign of any bath towels – these were eventually found on rails in the separate toilet!
reviews.title: Hoteliers learn from T hotel !!!

description: T Hotel welcomes you with its contemporary design right in front of the new Parco della Musica and the Lyric Theatre in Cagliari.It offers authentic hospitality rich in emotions to suit all your needs and to make each stay memorable.For you 207 designer rooms, a bar and a bistro with a winter garden, the gastronomic excellence of T Restaurant, regenerating relaxation offered in the Wellness Center T SPA.Treat yourself: we will make every stay memorable.
